segments.text: My gaze is drawn to the sink area on the right side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A single-basin sink is clearly overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running continuously, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a steady sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find this overflow quite disgusting, knowing the potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands right in front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on the plate, which seems odd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be standing in the growing puddle, but she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm astonished by her apparent unawareness of the running water.
segments.speaker: PAR
